name: Boyz n the Hood
summary: Tre Styles (Cuba Gooding Jr.), is a teen caught between the steady, forceful guidance of his father, Furious (Laurence Fishburne), and the inescapable violence of his South Central Los Angeles neighborhood.

name: Bugsy
summary: The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.

name: JFK
summary: Jim Garrison, a New Orleans district attorney, discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
summary: In pursuit of one serial killer, ambitious FBI student Clarice Starling (Foster) is forced to enlist the aid of another notorious killer, the incarcerated ex-psychiatrist known as "Hannibal the Cannibal" Lecter (Hopkins).

name: The Prince of Tides
summary: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.
